txt.en: 'Did you see him? The White Stag? So focused was I on pursuing the great beast that I paid less heed to my path than I should have.'
'I cannot thank you enough, friend. I will make my way out of the Wildwood. No more will I trouble the beasts here.'
The hunter can be found in the western Wildwood.\n\nYou should talk to the hunter you freed.
A hunter found the tables turned when he stumbled into a trap. Poachers will soon be returning for their prize.
The poachers' camp can be found in the southern Wildwood.\n\nThe hunter has asked for your assistance in defeating the poachers who trapped him.

'My am I lucky you happened by! It must have been hours since I got myself tangled up in this blasted net. Darn poachers!\n\n'I fear whoever laid this trap will come back for me! I saw some strange looking men camped to the south-east of here. What if they return? I don't stand a chance! Oh, I never should have hunted the White Stag! Please, you must help me!'
